roleset.name: provide a top for

example.name: top the list: Arg2 subj
example.text: Jaguar topped the most-active list, as its American depository receipts climbed 1 3/4 to 13 5/8 with more than 6.6 million ADRs traded.
example.arg: as its American depository receipts climbed 1 3/4 to 13 5/8 with more than 6.6 million ADRs traded

example.name: agentive
example.text: John tops his list of favorite ice-cream flavors with green mouse.
example.arg: his list of favorite ice-cream flavors

roleset.note: Verbnet classes contiguous_location-47.8 and butter-9.9; VN updated by Julia

roleset.name: surpass

example.name: relatively simple
example.text: In savings activity, Mr. Sandler said consumer deposits have enjoyed a steady increase throughout 1989, and topped $11 billion at quarter's end for the first time in the company's history.
example.arg: for the first time in the company's history

example.name: bunch of adjuncts
example.text: But advancing issues topped decliners by 784 to 700 on the Big Board despite the late sell programs, resulting from stock-index arbitrage.
example.arg: despite the late sell programs, resulting from stock-index arbitrage

roleset.note: Member of Vncls exceed-90. VN updated by Julia

predicate.note: Frames file for 'top' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. other framed members include contain, cover. Comparison with 'cover'.

roleset.name: top off: provide with a top

example.name: 'off' is redundant, really
example.text: He has leather jackets from Turkey that-1 [*T*-1]-2 are lined with eel skin and topped [*-2] off with raccoon-skin collars.

roleset.name: fill up completely when only partially empty

example.name: args 0, 1, MNR
example.text: I have a chunk of First State Asia Pacific Leaders , but that 's 20 % in Australia , so I-1 would prefer *PRO*-1 to ' top this up ' by also holding a fund that just concentrates on the countries above .
example.arg: by also holding a fund that just concentrates on the countries above

example.name: all args in a Shandy recipe
example.text: *PRO* Fill the glass half full with beer and top it up with lemonade.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.
